forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: flag reporting

comments.text: if something is against the terms or etiquette, you can flag areas, creations or people. open the respective dialog and look for the flag button, also sometimes on the back.
a certain number of flag reports can send a warning message with general topics to the other person, and result in grounding if many people flag.

thread.latestCommentText: a certain number of flag reports can send a warning message with general topics to the other person, and result in grounding if many people flag.
